catalog_script_client.name: Get Variables

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demo3 Request">1452e9df8335221034af11b6feaad3ae</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Variables</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(top.window.location.search);
    var parald = urlParams.get('catitem_id');
    //alert('returntp=' + returnType + ':' + parald);
    if (parald) {
        //alert('variable2');
        var ga = new GLideAjax('PrefillCatalogItemUtils');
        ga.addParam(' sysparm_name', 'getPreviousRequestData');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_paraId', paraId);
        ga.getMLAnswer(function(answer) {
            if (answer) {
                try {
                    var data = JSON.parse(answer);
                    if (data.software_name) {
                        g_form.setValue('software_name', data.software_name);
                    }
                    if (data.detailInfo) {
                        g_form.setValue('detailInfo', data.detailInfo);
                    }
                } catch (e) {

                }
            }
        });
        var sta = new GLideAjax('getStateFromLastForm');
        sta.addParam(' sysparm_name', 'getStateFunc');
        sta.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', parald);
        sta.getXMLAnswer(function(answer) {
            if (answer) {
                //alert(' from: '+answer);
                g_form.setValue('from', answer);
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-04 04:57:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>30781e6f833d621034af11b6feaad30a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Variables</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demo3" source="x_1755581_demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_30781e6f833d621034af11b6feaad30a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-05 06:17:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
